content:
I am a senior year Computer Engineering student at Sakarya University. I am working on Computer Vision, Image Processing, Machine Learning, and Web Development.
My goal is to develop personal talents and explore potential career areas through a full-time position in autonomy, control for autonomous systems, data science and web development.

title: Namig Aliyev
